item.title: Java简单输入输出
item.description:
<p>今晚做实验，用了一点java，是一个简单的输入名字和学号，还有温度，然后回显。</p>
<p>其实感觉下来和c有很多相似的地方。</p>
<div class="highlight" title="hello.java"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span><span class="lnt">14
</span><span class="lnt">15
</span><span class="lnt">16
</span><span class="lnt">17
</span><span class="lnt">18
</span><span class="lnt">19
</span><span class="lnt">20
</span><span class="lnt">21
</span><span class="lnt">22
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-java" data-lang="java"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="kn">package</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="nn">helloworld</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="kn">import</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="nn">java.util.Scanner</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="kd">public</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kd">class</span> <span class="nc">Helloworld</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w">	</span><span class="kd">public</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kd">static</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kt">void</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="nf">main</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">String</span><span class="o">[]</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">args</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w">		</span><span class="n">Scanner</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">sc</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="k">new</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">Scanner</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">System</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="na">in</span><span class="p">);</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w">		</span><span class="n">System</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="na">out</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="na">println</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">&#34;输入姓名和学号和温度:&#34;</span><span class="p">);</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w">		</span><span class="c1">// TODO Auto-generated method stub</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w">		
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w">		</span><span class="n">String</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">name</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">sc</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="na">next</span><span class="p">();</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1">//输入字符串</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w">		
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w">		</span><span class="n">String</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">id</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">sc</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="na">next</span><span class="p">();</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1">//sc.next可以以空格为分隔</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w">		
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w">		</span><span class="kt">int</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">temp</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">=</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">sc</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="na">nextInt</span><span class="p">();</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c1">//输入整数</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w">		
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w">		</span><span class="n">System</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="na">out</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="na">printf</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">&#34;你好，%s！ 你的学号是：%s；当前温度值为:%d度。%n&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">name</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">id</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">temp</span><span class="p">);</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w">		
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w">	</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="p">}</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>直接在IDE可以运行，也可以生成可执行文件，在文件目录下用命令行。</p>
<p>用命令<code>java -jar hello.jar</code>来执行。</p>

item.title: Batch自动ping并写入日志脚本
item.description:
<p>今天做睿联的笔试时，考了一个编写自动ping并写入日志的脚本的题，我才发现我对bat的传参等用法不太会，于是学了一下怎么写。</p>
<hr>
<p>先上代码</p>
<div class="highlight" title="pinglog.bat"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span><span class="lnt">14
</span><span class="lnt">15
</span><span class="lnt">16
</span><span class="lnt">17
</span><span class="lnt">18
</span><span class="lnt">19
</span><span class="lnt">20
</span><span class="lnt">21
</span><span class="lnt">22
</span><span class="lnt">23
</span><span class="lnt">24
</span><span class="lnt">25
</span><span class="lnt">26
</span><span class="lnt">27
</span><span class="lnt">28
</span><span class="lnt">29
</span><span class="lnt">30
</span><span class="lnt">31
</span><span class="lnt">32
</span><span class="lnt">33
</span><span class="lnt">34
</span><span class="lnt">35
</span><span class="lnt">36
</span><span class="lnt">37
</span><span class="lnt">38
</span><span class="lnt">39
</span><span class="lnt">40
</span><span class="lnt">41
</span><span class="lnt">42
</span><span class="lnt">43
</span><span class="lnt">44
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-batch" data-lang="batch"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">@</span><span class="k">echo</span> off
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">echo</span> --------------------------------------
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">echo</span> ping自动写入log
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">echo</span>.
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">echo</span> written by nightvoyager
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">echo</span>.
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">echo</span> 2024年9月27日20:01
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">echo</span> --------------------------------------
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">echo</span> 按CTRL+C以中止执行
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">set</span> <span class="k">/p</span> <span class="nv">host</span><span class="p">=</span>请输入需要ping的对象~
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">set</span> <span class="nv">logfile</span><span class="p">=</span>SUCC_<span class="nv">%host%</span>.txt
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">set</span> <span class="nv">failfile</span><span class="p">=</span>FAIL_<span class="nv">%host%</span>.txt
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">@</span><span class="k">echo</span> 目标地址为<span class="nv">%host%</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">ping <span class="nv">%host%</span> -n 1
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">echo</span> <span class="nv">%ERRORLEVEL%</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">if</span> <span class="nv">%ERRORLEVEL%</span><span class="o">==</span>0 <span class="k">GOTO</span> <span class="nl">SUCC</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">if</span> <span class="nv">%ERRORLEVEL%</span><span class="o">==</span>1 <span class="k">GOTO</span> <span class="nl">FAIL</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">:</span><span class="nl">SUCC</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">echo</span> Target Host=<span class="nv">%host%</span> <span class="p">&gt;&gt;</span><span class="nv">%logfile%</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">for</span> <span class="k">/f</span> <span class="s2">&#34;tokens=*&#34;</span> <span class="se">%%</span>A <span class="k">in</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;ping </span><span class="nv">%host%</span><span class="s1"> -n 1 &#39;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="k">do</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="k">echo</span> <span class="se">%%</span>A <span class="p">&amp;&amp;</span> <span class="k">echo</span> <span class="se">%%</span>A<span class="p">&gt;&gt;</span><span class="nv">%logfile%</span> <span class="p">&amp;&amp;</span> <span class="k">GOTO</span> <span class="nl">Ping</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">:</span><span class="nl">Ping</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">for</span> <span class="k">/f</span> <span class="s2">&#34;tokens=* skip=2&#34;</span> <span class="se">%%</span>A <span class="k">in</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;ping </span><span class="nv">%host%</span><span class="s1"> -n 1 &#39;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="k">do</span> <span class="p">(</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">echo</span> <span class="nv">%date%</span> <span class="nv">%time:~0,2%</span>:<span class="nv">%time:~3,2%</span>:<span class="nv">%time:~6,2%</span> <span class="se">%%</span>A<span class="p">&gt;&gt;</span><span class="nv">%logfile%</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">echo</span> <span class="nv">%date%</span> <span class="nv">%time:~0,2%</span>:<span class="nv">%time:~3,2%</span>:<span class="nv">%time:~6,2%</span> <span class="se">%%</span>A
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> timeout 1 <span class="p">&gt;</span>nul
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">GOTO</span> <span class="nl">Ping</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">:</span><span class="nl">FAIL</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">echo</span> Target Host=<span class="nv">%host%</span> <span class="p">&gt;&gt;</span><span class="nv">%failfile%</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">for</span> <span class="k">/f</span> <span class="s2">&#34;tokens=*&#34;</span> <span class="se">%%</span>B <span class="k">in</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;ping </span><span class="nv">%host%</span><span class="s1"> -n 1 &#39;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="k">do</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="k">echo</span> <span class="se">%%</span>B <span class="p">&amp;&amp;</span> <span class="k">echo</span> <span class="se">%%</span>B<span class="p">&gt;&gt;</span><span class="nv">%failfile%</span> <span class="p">&amp;&amp;</span> <span class="k">GOTO</span> <span class="nl">Faping</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">:</span><span class="nl">Faping</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">for</span> <span class="k">/f</span> <span class="s2">&#34;tokens=* skip=2&#34;</span> <span class="se">%%</span>B <span class="k">in</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;ping </span><span class="nv">%host%</span><span class="s1"> -n 1 &#39;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="k">do</span> <span class="p">(</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">echo</span> <span class="nv">%date%</span> <span class="nv">%time:~0,2%</span>:<span class="nv">%time:~3,2%</span>:<span class="nv">%time:~6,2%</span> <span class="se">%%</span>B<span class="p">&gt;&gt;</span><span class="nv">%failfile%</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">echo</span> <span class="nv">%date%</span> <span class="nv">%time:~0,2%</span>:<span class="nv">%time:~3,2%</span>:<span class="nv">%time:~6,2%</span> <span class="se">%%</span>B
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> timeout 1 <span class="p">&gt;</span>nul
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">GOTO</span> <span class="nl">Faping</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">@</span>cmd /k</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><hr>
<p>在window系统的batch中，设置变量使用<code>set</code> ,<code>\p</code>表示让用户输入值，<code>=</code>后的值是输入提示。</p>
<hr>
<p>使用<code>%变量名称%</code>来使用变量的值</p>
<hr>
<p><code>%ERRORLEVEL%</code>表示上一个命令的状态，判断上一个命令是否执行成果，成功则为 0 ，失败则为 1 。在这个脚本中，当ping通的时候，其值为1，否则为0。这个变量不需要提前声明，可以直接使用。依此，我们可以分别设定<code>ping</code>成功与失败时的操作。</p>
<hr>
<p><code>echo Target Host=%host% &gt;&gt;%failfile%</code></p>
<p>这一句用来将信息写入日志。其中<code>%failfle%</code>在前面已经声明了。如果工作目录下没有该文件，则batch会自动创建文件。<strong>注意前面声明的时候要加上文件类型的后缀。</strong></p>
<hr>
<p><code>GOTO</code>就是跳转到声明为<code>:名称</code>的地方并执行后续的命令。</p>
<hr>
<p>对于<code>for /f &quot;tokens=*&quot; %%B in ('ping %host% -n 1 ') do (echo %%B &amp;&amp; echo %%B&gt;&gt;%failfile% &amp;&amp; GOTO Faping)</code></p>
<p>看起来是一个很复杂的命令，把它分为几个部分</p>
<p>基本格式： <code>for %%i in (command1) do command2</code></p>
<p>类似于C语言的for命令，可用作循环语句。</p>
<p><code>%%i in (command1)</code>中，<code>i</code>可以是任意字母，区分大小写，表示<code>command1</code>的结果，也有点像linux的管道符<code>|</code>。</p>
<p><code>do command2</code>表示执行后续的命令，可以几个命令连用，就像上面的代码，同时执行<code>ping</code>和<code>echo</code>，并且可以使用<code>%%i</code></p>
<p><code>&quot;token=*&quot;</code>是可选项，表示忽略开头的空格，它的值还可以是数字。具体用法请上网搜索。</p>
<hr>
<p><code>&quot;skip=n&quot;</code>也是可选项，其中<code>n</code>为整数。表示<code>%%i</code>的值为<code>command1</code>的结果的第n行。</p>
<hr>
<p><code>%time:~0,2%</code>表示取时间从左往右的0-2位。</p>
<p>使用<code>echo %time%</code>命令可以查看时间的默认格式，是hh:mm:ss.ss</p>

item.title: Batch脚本编写
item.description:
<h2 id="ping脚本的编写" class="heading-element"><span>ping脚本的编写</span>
 <a href="#ping%e8%84%9a%e6%9c%ac%e7%9a%84%e7%bc%96%e5%86%99" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>由于之前没写过.bat脚本，先写一个简单的ping试试。注意ping的脚本不能命名为<code>ping.bat</code>，会出错。</p>
<div class="highlight" title="pin.bat"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-batch" data-lang="batch"><span class="line"><span class="cl">ping www.baidu.com
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">ping www.sina.com</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>双击是可以执行的，但是cmd窗口在实行完之后就自动关闭了，想到在push之后往往要查看结果，所以修改让cmd窗口执行完之后保留。</p>
<p>修改为</p>
<div class="highlight" title="pin.bat"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-batch" data-lang="batch"><span class="line"><span class="cl">ping www.baidu.com
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">ping www.sina.com
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">cmd /k</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>这样运行后cmd窗口不会关闭，但是会有一行</p>
<blockquote><p><code>C:\Users\yhxgo\hugoblog&gt;cmd /k</code></p>
</blockquote><p>也就是对执行<code>cmd /k</code>的回显，要想不显示回显，在这一命令前面+@，也就是</p>
<div class="highlight" title="pin.bat"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-batch" data-lang="batch"><span class="line"><span class="cl">ping www.baidu.com
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">ping www.sina.com
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">@</span>cmd /k</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>这样就可以正常执行ping并且执行完后不关闭cmd窗口也没有额外的回显。</p>
<p>然后编写push的脚本，很简单，就是把用到的几个命令合一块就可以了。<code>hpush.bat</code>文件放在博客的根目录，也就是<code>public</code>的上一级目录</p>
<div class="highlight" title="hpush.bat"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-batch" data-lang="batch"><span class="line"><span class="cl">hugo
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">cd</span> public
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git add .
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git commit -m update
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git push
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">cd</span> ..
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">@</span>cmd /k</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>双击运行可以正常push，成功实现脚本push。</p>
<p>那么再写一个本地部署调试的脚本吧~</p>
<p>一开始我写的是</p>
<div class="highlight" title="hsv.bat"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-batch" data-lang="batch"><span class="line"><span class="cl">hugo
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">hugo server
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">start</span> http://localhost:1313/
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">@</span>cmd /k</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>按照平时逐条命令然后打开浏览器的顺序来写，结果发现不能打开浏览器。因为执行<code>hugo server</code>后，cmd就停在这个地方了，需要<code>ctrl+c</code>停止后才能继续执行下一条打开网页，那么肯定是不行的，因为停止后在访问本地部署的地址就没东西了，所以改一下顺序</p>
<div class="highlight" title="hsv.bat"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-batch" data-lang="batch"><span class="line"><span class="cl">hugo
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">start</span> http://localhost:1313/
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">hugo server
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">@</span>cmd /k</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>然后双击运行就可以自动本地部署然后在浏览器打开本地网页了</p>

item.title: ESP32C3频率响应LED阵列
item.description:
<img src="https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-6809b4db1b569730b8444572bcfb7ea3_720w.png?source=d16d100b" alt="featured image" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"><h1 id="esp32c3_fft_ledmatrix" class="heading-element"><span>ESP32c3_FFT_LEDmatrix</span>
 <a href="#esp32c3_fft_ledmatrix" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h1><div class="bilibili">
 <iframe src="//player.bilibili.com/player.html?bvid=BV1hhh9egEjB&page=1&autoplay=false&poster=true&muted=false&danmaku=true&t=0" border="0" framespacing="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
</div>
<h2 id="条件" class="heading-element"><span>条件</span>
 <a href="#%e6%9d%a1%e4%bb%b6" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>需要的元件：Arduino ESP32c3、MAX9814麦克风模块、MAX72198*8LED阵列模块</p>
<p>环境：Windows10家庭版、Arduino IDE v2.0.4</p>
<p>使用的库函数：LedControl v1.0.6、ArduinoFFT v1.6.1</p>
<h2 id="原理图" class="heading-element"><span>原理图</span>
 <a href="#%e5%8e%9f%e7%90%86%e5%9b%be" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p><a class="lightgallery" href="https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-6809b4db1b569730b8444572bcfb7ea3_720w.png?source=d16d100b&amp;size=large" data-thumbnail="https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-6809b4db1b569730b8444572bcfb7ea3_720w.png?source=d16d100b&amp;size=small" data-sub-html="<h2>原理图</h2>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-6809b4db1b569730b8444572bcfb7ea3_720w.png?source=d16d100b" alt="原理图" srcset="https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-6809b4db1b569730b8444572bcfb7ea3_720w.png?source=d16d100b&amp;size=small, https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-6809b4db1b569730b8444572bcfb7ea3_720w.png?source=d16d100b&amp;size=medium 1.5x, https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-6809b4db1b569730b8444572bcfb7ea3_720w.png?source=d16d100b&amp;size=large 2x" data-title="原理图" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a></p>
<hr>
<p><strong>如果使用的是ESP32C3，在编译前请进行以下操作</strong></p>
<p>将<code>C:文档\Arduino\libraries\LedControl\src</code> 路径（也就是LEDControl库的安装路径）下的<code>LedControl.h</code>文件中的</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-c" data-lang="c"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cp">#include</span> <span class="cpf">&lt;avr/pgmspace.h&gt;</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>注释掉或者删除（大约在第30行），<strong>否则会报错</strong></p>
<p>如果不知道路径在哪，把鼠标指针放到代码里<code>#include &lt;LedControl.h&gt;</code>这一行IDE就会显示出来</p>
<hr>
<h2 id="连线" class="heading-element"><span>连线</span>
 <a href="#%e8%bf%9e%e7%ba%bf" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>

item.title: 无线信号测量及分析
item.description:
<img src="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-c9dd84bcb7b8d92c299081d6baba2a66_720w.png" alt="featured image" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"><ul>
<li>模3冲突</li>
</ul>
<p><a class="lightgallery" href="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-fe3ce1da96a3575e65624ea420938050_720w.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-fe3ce1da96a3575e65624ea420938050_720w.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2>https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-fe3ce1da96a3575e65624ea420938050_720w.png</h2>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-fe3ce1da96a3575e65624ea420938050_720w.png" alt="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-fe3ce1da96a3575e65624ea420938050_720w.png" srcset="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-fe3ce1da96a3575e65624ea420938050_720w.png?size=small, https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-fe3ce1da96a3575e65624ea420938050_720w.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-fe3ce1da96a3575e65624ea420938050_720w.png?size=large 2x" data-title="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-fe3ce1da96a3575e65624ea420938050_720w.png" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a></p>
<p>PCI全称Physical Cell Identifier，即物理小区标识，LTE中终端以此区分不同小区的无线信号。从物理层来看，PCI是由主同步信号（PSS）与辅同步信号（SSS）组成，可以通过简单运算获得
$$
PCI=PSS+{3}\times{SSS}
$$
模3干扰，其实就是两个小区的PCI值除3 余数相同，也就是PSS冲突，且方向对打，产生的干扰，例A小区PCI为9，除3余数为0，B小区PCI为21除3最后余数为0，且A跟B小区方向对打，就产生了模3干扰，一般处理方法可以是合理的调下其中一个小区的PCI位置，避开余数相同的小区对打。</p>
<ul>
<li>
<p>覆盖问题</p>
<p>RSRP (Reference Signal Receiving Power，参考信号接收功率) 是LTE网络中可以代表无线信号强度的关键参数。RSRP的功率可反应接收到信号的强度和覆盖的情况。</p>
<p>1.弱覆盖</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p><a class="lightgallery" href="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-9291c349fa0b848b5192dea71fc33c19_720w.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-9291c349fa0b848b5192dea71fc33c19_720w.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2>测量数据</h2>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-9291c349fa0b848b5192dea71fc33c19_720w.png" alt="测量数据" srcset="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-9291c349fa0b848b5192dea71fc33c19_720w.png?size=small, https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-9291c349fa0b848b5192dea71fc33c19_720w.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-9291c349fa0b848b5192dea71fc33c19_720w.png?size=large 2x" data-title="测量数据" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a></p>
<p>2.假弱覆盖</p>
<p><a class="lightgallery" href="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-06988d0fe24dd7585785f2d2bfb8faab_720w.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-06988d0fe24dd7585785f2d2bfb8faab_720w.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2>https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-06988d0fe24dd7585785f2d2bfb8faab_720w.png</h2>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-06988d0fe24dd7585785f2d2bfb8faab_720w.png" alt="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-06988d0fe24dd7585785f2d2bfb8faab_720w.png" srcset="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-06988d0fe24dd7585785f2d2bfb8faab_720w.png?size=small, https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-06988d0fe24dd7585785f2d2bfb8faab_720w.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-06988d0fe24dd7585785f2d2bfb8faab_720w.png?size=large 2x" data-title="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-06988d0fe24dd7585785f2d2bfb8faab_720w.png" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a></p>
<p>在很近的位置由高强度和低强度的小区，调整接入小区规则和邻区来改善质量。</p>
<p><a class="lightgallery" href="https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-bfe109ff7456d0de810a8e55192064d7_720w.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-bfe109ff7456d0de810a8e55192064d7_720w.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2>https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-bfe109ff7456d0de810a8e55192064d7_720w.png</h2>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-bfe109ff7456d0de810a8e55192064d7_720w.png" alt="https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-bfe109ff7456d0de810a8e55192064d7_720w.png" srcset="https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-bfe109ff7456d0de810a8e55192064d7_720w.png?size=small, https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-bfe109ff7456d0de810a8e55192064d7_720w.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-bfe109ff7456d0de810a8e55192064d7_720w.png?size=large 2x" data-title="https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-bfe109ff7456d0de810a8e55192064d7_720w.png" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a></p>
<p><a class="lightgallery" href="https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-d7e3c87f6fcf693338c2391ccc22c503_720w.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-d7e3c87f6fcf693338c2391ccc22c503_720w.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2>https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-d7e3c87f6fcf693338c2391ccc22c503_720w.png</h2>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-d7e3c87f6fcf693338c2391ccc22c503_720w.png" alt="https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-d7e3c87f6fcf693338c2391ccc22c503_720w.png" srcset="https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-d7e3c87f6fcf693338c2391ccc22c503_720w.png?size=small, https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-d7e3c87f6fcf693338c2391ccc22c503_720w.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-d7e3c87f6fcf693338c2391ccc22c503_720w.png?size=large 2x" data-title="https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-d7e3c87f6fcf693338c2391ccc22c503_720w.png" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a></p>
<p>以下内容由小组共同完成</p>
<p>主要的测试过程就是将电脑连接到手机和gps，手机根据有gps给的位置和接收到的各基站信号的强弱打点。</p>
<p>手机不断地进行ping或者拨号来和基站交换信息以记录信号的情况，每一次呼叫或者ping都会生成一个点，连续的ping，即可在路径上由点连成线来观测路径上各位置的信号状况。</p>
<hr>
<p>测试西邮校区信号强度并分析基站调整策略</p>
<p>一、实训目的</p>
<p>1、pilot pioneer软件安装；</p>
<p>2、相关硬件安装。</p>
<p>3、利用pilot pioneer软件对西邮校园各点进行信号强度测量；</p>
<p>4、与2019年信号强度数据进行对比，猜测基站的调整方法。</p>
<hr>
<p>二、实训步骤</p>
<p>1、 安装测试软件鼎利pioneer；</p>
<p>2、 安装硬件加密狗（类似u盘）；</p>
<p>3、 安装手机驱动程序；</p>
<p>4、 安装GPS接收机驱动程序；</p>
<p>5、 打点测试。</p>
<hr>
<p>三、问题寻找与分析</p>
<p>覆盖问题</p>
<p>·覆盖差区域——RSRP（参考信号接收功率）小于-105dBm——红</p>
<p>·覆盖一般区域——RSRP为-100dBm到-95dBm——浅蓝</p>
<p>·覆盖良好区域——RSRP为-95dBm以上——浅绿</p>
<p>·覆盖特别好区域——RSRP大于-80dBm——深绿</p>
<p>质量问题</p>
<p>·质量差区域：SINR小于3——红</p>
<p>·质量一般区域：SINR为3到15——浅绿</p>
<p>·质量好区域：SINR为15以上——深绿</p>
<p>弱覆盖</p>
<p>真的弱覆盖</p>
<p>·调整周边小区天馈</p>
<p>·增加小区</p>
<p>非真弱覆盖</p>
<p>·完善邻区关系</p>
<p>·调整切换参数</p>
<p>质量问题</p>
<p>邻区不完整</p>
<p>·完善邻区关系</p>
<p>重叠覆盖</p>
<p>·控制周边小区覆盖</p>
<p>模3干扰</p>
<p>·调整PCI</p>
<p>·调整小区天馈</p>
<hr>
<p>四、数据分析与对比</p>
<p><a href="https://www.baidu.com/s?wd=EARFCN&amp;rsv_idx=2&amp;tn=15007414_12_dg&amp;usm=1&amp;ie=utf-8&amp;rsv_pq=e99ab96404059eaf&amp;oq=earfcn%e5%9c%a8%e9%80%9a%e4%bf%a1%e4%b8%ad%e5%8f%ab%e4%bb%80%e4%b9%88&amp;rsv_t=0f28PfXBXrNPtxr5itI2l3sNRNC3TmbnaM3BIMJbRv6opFOLy7258JbEcKmfwJGCDPR8hiU&amp;sa=re_dqa_zy&amp;icon=1"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">EARFCN</a>在通信中称为E-UTRA Absolute Radio Frequency Channel Number。</p>
<p><strong>EARFCN</strong>是LTE系统中用来表示频段的参数，它是一个无单位的数字，用于标识TE系统中的每个频段。频段是指无线通信中分配给各种无线技术使用的一段特定的频率范围。<strong>RSRP</strong>（Reference Signal Received Power）：参考信号接收功率，是衡量UE（用户设备）在某一服务小区内接收到的下行参考信号的功率大小。RSRP主要反映了UE与基站之间的无线信号强度，是评估无线链路质量的重要参数。</p>
<p><strong>RSRQ</strong>（Reference Signal Received Quality）：参考信号接收质量，是UE测量到的参考信号的质量。RSRQ是通过比较接收到的参考信号功率与总干扰加噪声功率来计算的，因此它可以更全面地反映UE在特定小区内的信号质量。</p>
<p><a href="https://www.baidu.com/s?wd=RSSI&amp;rsv_idx=2&amp;tn=15007414_12_dg&amp;usm=3&amp;ie=utf-8&amp;rsv_pq=9f9d8aea04028792&amp;oq=rssi%e6%98%af%e4%bb%80%e4%b9%88%e6%84%8f%e6%80%9d&amp;rsv_t=6f1booC7R0QArUfGKBxlPXuxUHPUJlMpheaTguK9I5R5sruUsWMZFSWNklUKX8NQ7rVU1yg&amp;sa=re_dqa_zy&amp;icon=1"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">RSSI</a>是&quot;Received Signal Strength Indication&quot;的缩写，即接收的信号强度指示。它是一个用于衡量设备从基站或其他发射点接收到的信号强度的测量单位，通常以<a href="https://www.baidu.com/s?wd=dBm&amp;rsv_idx=2&amp;tn=15007414_12_dg&amp;usm=3&amp;ie=utf-8&amp;rsv_pq=9f9d8aea04028792&amp;oq=rssi%e6%98%af%e4%bb%80%e4%b9%88%e6%84%8f%e6%80%9d&amp;rsv_t=3fbfii3EVvs1t0u8C7dzJq1NZN9nyU6dNmDx/UBuDdMjRALKcGZecYjWVpWRP21l1&#43;ptctQ&amp;sa=re_dqa_zy&amp;icon=1"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">dBm</a>（分贝毫瓦）表示。RSSI的值越大，表示设备接收到的信号越强。RSSI不仅用于判断链接质量，还是决定是否增大广播发送强度的一个依据。RSSI的测量值一般不包括天线增益或传输系统的损耗，它是一种定位技术，通过接收到的信号强弱测定信号点与接收点的距离，进而根据相应数据进行定位计算。</p>
<p><a class="lightgallery" href="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-c9dd84bcb7b8d92c299081d6baba2a66_720w.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-c9dd84bcb7b8d92c299081d6baba2a66_720w.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2>西邮部分道路实测信号强度</h2>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-c9dd84bcb7b8d92c299081d6baba2a66_720w.png" alt="西邮部分道路实测信号强度" srcset="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-c9dd84bcb7b8d92c299081d6baba2a66_720w.png?size=small, https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-c9dd84bcb7b8d92c299081d6baba2a66_720w.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-c9dd84bcb7b8d92c299081d6baba2a66_720w.png?size=large 2x" data-title="西邮部分道路实测信号强度" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a></p>
<p>（一）-105dBm</p>
<p>1、西操场</p>
<p><a class="lightgallery" href="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-d84a4d9ec7c1dd1cfd4352db918ad273_720w.jpeg?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-d84a4d9ec7c1dd1cfd4352db918ad273_720w.jpeg?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2>https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-d84a4d9ec7c1dd1cfd4352db918ad273_720w.jpeg</h2>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-d84a4d9ec7c1dd1cfd4352db918ad273_720w.jpeg" alt="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-d84a4d9ec7c1dd1cfd4352db918ad273_720w.jpeg" srcset="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-d84a4d9ec7c1dd1cfd4352db918ad273_720w.jpeg?size=small, https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-d84a4d9ec7c1dd1cfd4352db918ad273_720w.jpeg?size=medium 1.5x, https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-d84a4d9ec7c1dd1cfd4352db918ad273_720w.jpeg?size=large 2x" data-title="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-d84a4d9ec7c1dd1cfd4352db918ad273_720w.jpeg" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a></p>
<p><a class="lightgallery" href="https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-7bc5a5056087260dbcd316d8ebc86529_720w.gif?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-7bc5a5056087260dbcd316d8ebc86529_720w.gif?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2>https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-7bc5a5056087260dbcd316d8ebc86529_720w.gif</h2>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-7bc5a5056087260dbcd316d8ebc86529_720w.gif" alt="https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-7bc5a5056087260dbcd316d8ebc86529_720w.gif" srcset="https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-7bc5a5056087260dbcd316d8ebc86529_720w.gif?size=small, https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-7bc5a5056087260dbcd316d8ebc86529_720w.gif?size=medium 1.5x, https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-7bc5a5056087260dbcd316d8ebc86529_720w.gif?size=large 2x" data-title="https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-7bc5a5056087260dbcd316d8ebc86529_720w.gif" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a></p>

<p>3、2019学术交流中心（没有重合路径）故只对2019的信号强度进行单独分析</p>

<p>根据基站和楼层相对位置可知，改变天馈无法解决弱覆盖问题，猜测应该增加小区</p>
<hr>
<p>（二）-100dBm</p>
<p>1、教学楼</p>
<p>2019</p>

<p>4、教学楼</p>

<p><a class="lightgallery" href="https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-6363f7e4f4fcc3a94dd7aaf5e3b9dd8c_720w.jpeg?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-6363f7e4f4fcc3a94dd7aaf5e3b9dd8c_720w.jpeg?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2>https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-6363f7e4f4fcc3a94dd7aaf5e3b9dd8c_720w.jpeg</h2>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-6363f7e4f4fcc3a94dd7aaf5e3b9dd8c_720w.jpeg" alt="https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-6363f7e4f4fcc3a94dd7aaf5e3b9dd8c_720w.jpeg" srcset="https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-6363f7e4f4fcc3a94dd7aaf5e3b9dd8c_720w.jpeg?size=small, https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-6363f7e4f4fcc3a94dd7aaf5e3b9dd8c_720w.jpeg?size=medium 1.5x, https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-6363f7e4f4fcc3a94dd7aaf5e3b9dd8c_720w.jpeg?size=large 2x" data-title="https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-6363f7e4f4fcc3a94dd7aaf5e3b9dd8c_720w.jpeg" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a></p>
<p><a class="lightgallery" href="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-0e857d4e4ef0ebcf7eb08dd76cd1abd6_720w.jpeg?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-0e857d4e4ef0ebcf7eb08dd76cd1abd6_720w.jpeg?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2>https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-0e857d4e4ef0ebcf7eb08dd76cd1abd6_720w.jpeg</h2>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-0e857d4e4ef0ebcf7eb08dd76cd1abd6_720w.jpeg" alt="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-0e857d4e4ef0ebcf7eb08dd76cd1abd6_720w.jpeg" srcset="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-0e857d4e4ef0ebcf7eb08dd76cd1abd6_720w.jpeg?size=small, https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-0e857d4e4ef0ebcf7eb08dd76cd1abd6_720w.jpeg?size=medium 1.5x, https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-0e857d4e4ef0ebcf7eb08dd76cd1abd6_720w.jpeg?size=large 2x" data-title="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-0e857d4e4ef0ebcf7eb08dd76cd1abd6_720w.jpeg" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a></p>
<p>和2024年相比，-90dBm以上信号较多；并且发现教学楼旁和该路上都为同一个基站进行覆盖，<del>故猜测牺牲人数密度小的信号强度来改善教学楼的信号强度</del>，主要原因可能是4g的部分带宽划给5g，中国移动2600M频段双工TDD制式LTR/NR带宽有160M，20年后随着5G的建设，100M分给了5G，导致4G信号变弱。</p>
<p>2、3号教学楼</p>
<p><a class="lightgallery" href="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-e417e688eced02caae1f1527688ed0b9_720w.jpeg?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-e417e688eced02caae1f1527688ed0b9_720w.jpeg?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2>https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-e417e688eced02caae1f1527688ed0b9_720w.jpeg</h2>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-e417e688eced02caae1f1527688ed0b9_720w.jpeg" alt="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-e417e688eced02caae1f1527688ed0b9_720w.jpeg" srcset="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-e417e688eced02caae1f1527688ed0b9_720w.jpeg?size=small, https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-e417e688eced02caae1f1527688ed0b9_720w.jpeg?size=medium 1.5x, https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-e417e688eced02caae1f1527688ed0b9_720w.jpeg?size=large 2x" data-title="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-e417e688eced02caae1f1527688ed0b9_720w.jpeg" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a></p>
<p><a class="lightgallery" href="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-6c5746f8c8d6bcbb4efd5ee61870780a_720w.gif?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-6c5746f8c8d6bcbb4efd5ee61870780a_720w.gif?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2>https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-6c5746f8c8d6bcbb4efd5ee61870780a_720w.gif</h2>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-6c5746f8c8d6bcbb4efd5ee61870780a_720w.gif" alt="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-6c5746f8c8d6bcbb4efd5ee61870780a_720w.gif" srcset="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-6c5746f8c8d6bcbb4efd5ee61870780a_720w.gif?size=small, https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-6c5746f8c8d6bcbb4efd5ee61870780a_720w.gif?size=medium 1.5x, https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-6c5746f8c8d6bcbb4efd5ee61870780a_720w.gif?size=large 2x" data-title="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-6c5746f8c8d6bcbb4efd5ee61870780a_720w.gif" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a></p>
<p>3号教学楼旁信号得到改善，猜测基站天馈变化或增加了基站数量</p>
<p>3、西篮球场</p>
<p><a class="lightgallery" href="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-00f3fe5d5e75f50da2dd24df247e462c_720w.jpeg?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-00f3fe5d5e75f50da2dd24df247e462c_720w.jpeg?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2>https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-00f3fe5d5e75f50da2dd24df247e462c_720w.jpeg</h2>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-00f3fe5d5e75f50da2dd24df247e462c_720w.jpeg" alt="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-00f3fe5d5e75f50da2dd24df247e462c_720w.jpeg" srcset="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-00f3fe5d5e75f50da2dd24df247e462c_720w.jpeg?size=small, https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-00f3fe5d5e75f50da2dd24df247e462c_720w.jpeg?size=medium 1.5x, https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-00f3fe5d5e75f50da2dd24df247e462c_720w.jpeg?size=large 2x" data-title="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-00f3fe5d5e75f50da2dd24df247e462c_720w.jpeg" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a></p>
<p><a class="lightgallery" href="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-2c7ed1e7faaaa96a166c3db19a42486f_720w.gif?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-2c7ed1e7faaaa96a166c3db19a42486f_720w.gif?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2>https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-2c7ed1e7faaaa96a166c3db19a42486f_720w.gif</h2>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-2c7ed1e7faaaa96a166c3db19a42486f_720w.gif" alt="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-2c7ed1e7faaaa96a166c3db19a42486f_720w.gif" srcset="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-2c7ed1e7faaaa96a166c3db19a42486f_720w.gif?size=small, https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-2c7ed1e7faaaa96a166c3db19a42486f_720w.gif?size=medium 1.5x, https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-2c7ed1e7faaaa96a166c3db19a42486f_720w.gif?size=large 2x" data-title="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-2c7ed1e7faaaa96a166c3db19a42486f_720w.gif" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a></p>
<p>西操场信号依旧较强</p>
<hr>
<p>（四）-80dBm</p>
<p>对-80dBm以上信号进行对比，分析整体信号改善情况</p>
<p>1、 西操场</p>
<p><a class="lightgallery" href="https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-91daa6370d28e377e9cb1db0b6807278_720w.jpeg?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-91daa6370d28e377e9cb1db0b6807278_720w.jpeg?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2>https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-91daa6370d28e377e9cb1db0b6807278_720w.jpeg</h2>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-91daa6370d28e377e9cb1db0b6807278_720w.jpeg" alt="https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-91daa6370d28e377e9cb1db0b6807278_720w.jpeg" srcset="https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-91daa6370d28e377e9cb1db0b6807278_720w.jpeg?size=small, https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-91daa6370d28e377e9cb1db0b6807278_720w.jpeg?size=medium 1.5x, https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-91daa6370d28e377e9cb1db0b6807278_720w.jpeg?size=large 2x" data-title="https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-91daa6370d28e377e9cb1db0b6807278_720w.jpeg" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a></p>
<p>2、教学楼和学术交流中心</p>
<p><a class="lightgallery" href="https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-320195c603cb862aedfc2a2e0b1327e0_720w.jpeg?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-320195c603cb862aedfc2a2e0b1327e0_720w.jpeg?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2>https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-320195c603cb862aedfc2a2e0b1327e0_720w.jpeg</h2>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-320195c603cb862aedfc2a2e0b1327e0_720w.jpeg" alt="https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-320195c603cb862aedfc2a2e0b1327e0_720w.jpeg" srcset="https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-320195c603cb862aedfc2a2e0b1327e0_720w.jpeg?size=small, https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-320195c603cb862aedfc2a2e0b1327e0_720w.jpeg?size=medium 1.5x, https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-320195c603cb862aedfc2a2e0b1327e0_720w.jpeg?size=large 2x" data-title="https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-320195c603cb862aedfc2a2e0b1327e0_720w.jpeg" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a></p>
<p>3、湖边崇德路</p>
<p><a class="lightgallery" href="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-69b80b31e264a312e7d882b19b9b7dc0_720w.jpg?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-69b80b31e264a312e7d882b19b9b7dc0_720w.jpg?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2>https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-69b80b31e264a312e7d882b19b9b7dc0_720w.jpg</h2>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-69b80b31e264a312e7d882b19b9b7dc0_720w.jpg" alt="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-69b80b31e264a312e7d882b19b9b7dc0_720w.jpg" srcset="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-69b80b31e264a312e7d882b19b9b7dc0_720w.jpg?size=small, https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-69b80b31e264a312e7d882b19b9b7dc0_720w.jpg?size=medium 1.5x, https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-69b80b31e264a312e7d882b19b9b7dc0_720w.jpg?size=large 2x" data-title="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-69b80b31e264a312e7d882b19b9b7dc0_720w.jpg" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a></p>

item.title: 计网笔记
item.description:
<h2 id="概念" class="heading-element"><span>概念</span>
 <a href="#%e6%a6%82%e5%bf%b5" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p><strong>ITU</strong>（International Telecommunication Union， 国际电信联盟</p>
<p><strong>ISO</strong>（International Standards Organization，国 际标准化组织）</p>
<p><strong>IEEE</strong>（Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers，电气和电子工程师协会）</p>
<p><strong>PPP</strong> （Point-to-Point Protocol） 端到端协议</p>
<p><strong>SAP</strong>（stable abstraction principle ）稳定抽象原则</p>
<p><strong>ICMP</strong>（Internet Control Message Protocol）Internet控制 报文 协议</p>
<p>传输控制协议（<strong>TCP</strong>，Transmission Control Protocol）</p>
<p><strong>UDP</strong> User Datagram Protocol 用户数据报协议</p>
<p>开放式最短路径优先<strong>OSPF</strong>（Open Shortest Path First）</p>
<p>动态主机配置协议<strong>DHCP</strong>（Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol）</p>
<p>路由信息协议<strong>RIP</strong>（Routing Information Protocol）基于距离矢量算法的路由协议，利用跳数来作为计量标准</p>
<p><strong>实时传输协议</strong>（<strong>Real-time Transport Protocol</strong>或简写<strong>RTP</strong>）是一个<a href="https://baike.baidu.com/item/%e7%bd%91%e7%bb%9c%e4%bc%a0%e8%be%93%e5%8d%8f%e8%ae%ae/0?fromModule=lemma_inlink"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">网络传输协议</a>，它是由IETF的多媒体传输工作小组1996年在RFC 1889中公布的。</p>
<p>实时传输控制协议(<strong>R</strong>eal-<strong>t</strong>ime transport <strong>C</strong>ontrol <strong>P</strong>rotocol，RTCP)</p>
<p><strong>NAT</strong>（Network Address Translation），是指网络地址转换，1994年提出的。NAT是用于在本地网络中使用私有地址，在连接互联网时转而使用全局 IP 地址的技术。</p>
<p><strong>TSAP</strong> Transport Service Access Point 传输服务访问点</p>
<p><strong>ARP</strong>（Address Resolution Protocol，地址解析协议）是用来将IP地址解析为MAC地址的协议。主机或三层网络设备上会维护一张ARP表，用于存储IP地址和MAC地址的映射关系，一般ARP表项包括动态ARP表项和静态ARP表项。</p>
<p>OSI (Open System Interconnection Reference Model)开放式通信系统互联参考模型</p>
<p>DNS（Domain Name System）域名解析协议、域名系统</p>
<p>国际互联网工程任务组（The Internet Engineering Task Force，简称 IETF）</p>
<p><strong>征求意见稿</strong>（英语：Request For Comments，缩写为RFC）</p>
<p>PSTN 公共交换电话网络</p>
<p>非对称<a href="https://baike.baidu.com/item/%e6%95%b0%e5%ad%97%e7%94%a8%e6%88%b7%e7%ba%bf%e8%b7%af/18758554?fromModule=lemma_inlink"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">数字用户线路</a>（ADSL，Asymmetric Digital Subscriber Line）</p>
<p>MACA带有冲突避免的多路访问</p>
<p>非屏蔽双绞线(UTP：Unshielded Twisted Pair)</p>
<p>屏蔽双绞线(STP：Shielded Twisted Pair)</p>
<p><strong>IGMP</strong>(Internet Group Management Protocol，因特网组管理协议)允许Internet中的计算机参加多播，是计算机用做向相邻多目路由器报告多组成员的协议。多目路由器是支持组播的路由器，它向本地网络发送IGMP查询，计算机通过发送IGMP报告来应答查询。多目路由器负责将组播包转发到网络中所有组播成员。</p>
<p>ATM 异步传输模式(Asynchronous Transfer Mode)</p>
<p>无类别域间路由（Classless Inter-Domain Routing、CIDR）</p>
<h2 id="知识点" class="heading-element"><span>知识点</span>
 <a href="#%e7%9f%a5%e8%af%86%e7%82%b9" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>802.3网络 MAC地址长度为48位（6个字节）</p>
<p><strong>成帧方法</strong> ：</p>
<p>字符计数法</p>
<p>含字节填充的分界符法</p>
<p>含位填充的分界标志法</p>
<p>物理层编码违例法</p>
<p><a class="lightgallery" href="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-73e5887f92e82f68fd54572e340472e1_720w.png?source=d16d100b&amp;size=large" data-thumbnail="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-73e5887f92e82f68fd54572e340472e1_720w.png?source=d16d100b&amp;size=small" data-sub-html="<h2>IP数据报</h2>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-73e5887f92e82f68fd54572e340472e1_720w.png?source=d16d100b" alt="IP数据报" srcset="https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-73e5887f92e82f68fd54572e340472e1_720w.png?source=d16d100b&amp;size=small, https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-73e5887f92e82f68fd54572e340472e1_720w.png?source=d16d100b&amp;size=medium 1.5x, https://picx.zhimg.com/80/v2-73e5887f92e82f68fd54572e340472e1_720w.png?source=d16d100b&amp;size=large 2x" data-title="IP数据报" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a></p>
<p><a class="lightgallery" href="https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-fd6a23525efe79103335a806082aa340_720w.png?source=d16d100b&amp;size=large" data-thumbnail="https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-fd6a23525efe79103335a806082aa340_720w.png?source=d16d100b&amp;size=small" data-sub-html="<h2>TCP协议头</h2>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-fd6a23525efe79103335a806082aa340_720w.png?source=d16d100b" alt="TCP协议头" srcset="https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-fd6a23525efe79103335a806082aa340_720w.png?source=d16d100b&amp;size=small, https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-fd6a23525efe79103335a806082aa340_720w.png?source=d16d100b&amp;size=medium 1.5x, https://pic1.zhimg.com/80/v2-fd6a23525efe79103335a806082aa340_720w.png?source=d16d100b&amp;size=large 2x" data-title="TCP协议头" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a></p>
<p>TCP协议头在数据部分</p>
<p>ICMP 报文封装在IP数据报中</p>
<p>前导域：10101010，用于接收方和发送方时钟同步。 8个字节</p>
<p>TCP在不可靠的互联网络上，提供一个端 到端的，全双工的，可靠的，面向连接的， 一对一的字节流服务</p>
<hr>
<p>24年9月21日重启</p>
<p><strong>邮箱</strong></p>
<p>pop3、IMAP、SNMP</p>
<p><a href="https://blog.csdn.net/Tomcat_king/article/details/117806384"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">POP3、SMTP和IMAP之间的区别和联系_smpt pop3 imap-CSDN博客</a></p>
<p>简单网络管理协议（<strong>SNMP</strong>）是TCP/IP协议簇的一个应用层协议。在1988年被制定，并被Internet体系结构委员会（IAB）采纳作为一个短期的网络管理解决方案；由于SNMP的简单性，在Internet时代得到了蓬勃的发展，1992年发布了SNMPv2版本，以增强SNMPv1的安全性和功能。现在，已经有了SNMPv3版本。</p>

item.title: 序列检测状态机
item.description:
<h2 id="序列检测器" class="heading-element"><span><strong>序列检测器</strong></span>
 <a href="#%e5%ba%8f%e5%88%97%e6%a3%80%e6%b5%8b%e5%99%a8" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>序列检测器是一种数字电路，用于检测输入序列中是否出现预定义的特定序列。三段式序列检测器是一种常用的实现方式，它将检测过程分为三个阶段：复位状态、中间状态和检测状态。</p>
<ol>
<li>复位状态:</li>
</ol>
<p>这是电路的初始状态，表示还没有检测到任何目标序列的一部分。</p>
<p>在此状态下，电路会忽略所有输入，直到接收到目标序列的第一个比特。</p>
<p>通常使用一个复位信号来初始化电路到复位状态。</p>
<ol start="2">
<li>中间状态:</li>
</ol>
<p>当电路接收到目标序列中的部分比特时，它会进入一个或多个中间状态。</p>
<p>中间状态的数量取决于目标序列的长度和复杂性。</p>
<p>每个中间状态都表示已经检测到目标序列的一部分，并等待接收后续比特。</p>
<p>电路根据当前状态和输入比特，跳转到下一个状态或返回复位状态。</p>
<ol start="3">
<li>检测状态:</li>
</ol>
<p>当电路接收到完整的目标序列时，它会进入检测状态。</p>
<p>在此状态下，电路会输出一个信号，表示已经成功检测到目标序列。</p>
<p>然后，电路可以根据设计选择返回复位状态或继续检测下一个目标序列。</p>
<p>三段式序列检测器可以使用多种逻辑电路来实现，如状态机:</p>
<p>使用状态转移图和状态表来描述电路的行为，并使用触发器和组合逻辑电路来实现状态转换和输出逻辑</p>
<ol start="4">
<li>状态转移列表</li>
</ol>
<table>

<div class="highlight" title="ztj.v"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1

<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-verilog" data-lang="verilog"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">module</span> <span class="n">ztj</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">D_out</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">D_in</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">rst_n</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">clk</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1">// 定义状态编码，每个状态用5位二进制表示
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span><span class="k">parameter</span> <span class="n">IDLE</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mh">5</span><span class="mb">&#39;b00000</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="c1">//空闲状态
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span><span class="k">parameter</span> <span class="n">A</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mh">5</span><span class="mb">&#39;b00001</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="c1">//A
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span><span class="k">parameter</span> <span class="n">B</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mh">5</span><span class="mb">&#39;b00010</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="c1">//B
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span><span class="k">parameter</span> <span class="n">C</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mh">5</span><span class="mb">&#39;b00100</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="c1">//C
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span><span class="k">parameter</span> <span class="n">D</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mh">5</span><span class="mb">&#39;b01000</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="c1">//D
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span><span class="k">parameter</span> <span class="n">E</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mh">5</span><span class="mb">&#39;b10000</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="c1">//E
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1">// 定义输入输出端口
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span><span class="k">input</span> <span class="n">D_in</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="c1">// 数据输入
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span><span class="k">input</span> <span class="n">clk</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="c1">//时钟
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span><span class="k">input</span> <span class="n">rst_n</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="c1">//复位
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span><span class="k">output</span> <span class="kt">wire</span> <span class="n">D_out</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="c1">//检测输出
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="kt">reg</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mh">4</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="mh">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="n">current_state</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">next_state</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="c1">//设置当前状态和下个状态变量
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">assign</span> <span class="n">D_out</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">current_state</span><span class="o">==</span><span class="n">E</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">?</span><span class="mh">1</span><span class="o">:</span><span class="mh">0</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="c1">//判断当前状态是否状态E，是则置输出为1，否则0
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1">//状态转换
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span><span class="k">always</span> <span class="p">@(</span><span class="k">posedge</span> <span class="n">clk</span> <span class="k">or</span> <span class="k">negedge</span> <span class="n">rst_n</span><span class="p">)</span> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">begin</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="o">!</span><span class="n">rst_n</span><span class="p">)</span> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">current_state</span> <span class="o">&lt;=</span> <span class="n">IDLE</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">else</span> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">current_state</span> <span class="o">&lt;=</span> <span class="n">next_state</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">end</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1">//根据当前状态和输入判断将要跳转的状态
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span><span class="k">always</span> <span class="p">@(</span><span class="n">current_state</span> <span class="k">or</span> <span class="n">D_in</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">begin</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">case</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">current_state</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="c1">//通过状态转移图编写
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="nl">IDLE:</span> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">D_in</span><span class="o">==</span><span class="mh">0</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">next_state</span><span class="o">&lt;=</span><span class="n">IDLE</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">else</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">next_state</span><span class="o">&lt;=</span><span class="n">A</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="c1">//1
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="nl">A:</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">D_in</span><span class="o">==</span><span class="mh">0</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">next_state</span><span class="o">&lt;=</span><span class="n">B</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="c1">//0
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="k">else</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">next_state</span><span class="o">&lt;=</span><span class="n">A</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nl">B:</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">D_in</span><span class="o">==</span><span class="mh">0</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">next_state</span><span class="o">&lt;=</span><span class="n">C</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="c1">//0
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="k">else</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">next_state</span><span class="o">&lt;=</span><span class="n">A</span><span class="p">;</span> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nl">C:</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">D_in</span><span class="o">==</span><span class="mh">0</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">next_state</span><span class="o">&lt;=</span><span class="n">IDLE</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">else</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">next_state</span><span class="o">&lt;=</span><span class="n">D</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="c1">//1
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="nl">D:</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">D_in</span><span class="o">==</span><span class="mh">0</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">next_state</span><span class="o">&lt;=</span><span class="n">B</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">else</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">next_state</span><span class="o">&lt;=</span><span class="n">E</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="c1">//1；检测到10011
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="nl">E:</span> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">D_in</span><span class="o">==</span><span class="mh">0</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">next_state</span><span class="o">&lt;=</span><span class="n">B</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">else</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">next_state</span><span class="o">&lt;=</span><span class="n">A</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">default</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="n">next_state</span><span class="o">&lt;=</span><span class="n">IDLE</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="c1">//缺省
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="k">endcase</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">end</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">endmodule</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
